nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.plugin

Class MazeElementRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.plugin.MazeElementRegistry

  • public class MazeElementRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    This is for registering new tiles/items/actors from level plug-ins so the program can use them. It provides a way to create instances of them (through reflection using the Class objects). Basic elements created normally (as part of program) also need to be registered. It uses the singleton design pattern so the constructor can not be used to create an instance. Instead the getInstance() method must be used.
